Loading libraries

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
# library(ggthemes)
library(dplyr)
library(caTools)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(stringi)

```

Loading data 

```{r}

# Execute the data preparation file to get data from it

source("./data_prepared.R")

# dataset name = used_cars_data

```

Increasing price by year Plot

```{r}

price_inscreasing_plot <- used_cars_data %>%
  sample_n(200) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x = year, y = price, size = odometer, color = size)) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
    # theme_minimal() +
    theme_ipsum() +
    ggtitle("Cars price by year : Demo 200 cars")

ggplotly(price_inscreasing_plot)

```


condition and drive and  by price Plot

```{r}

condition_price_plot <- used_cars_data %>%
  sample_n(100) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x = condition, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, aes(colour = drive, size = odometer))
  theme_ipsum() +
  ggtitle("Condition and drive vehicles type by price")
  
ggplotly(condition_price_plot)

```

Vehicles Manufacturers count plot 

```{r}

manufacturer_plot <- used_cars_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = manufacturer)) +
  geom_bar(alpha = 0.5) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle("Vehicles Manufacturers") +
  labs(x = "Manufacturer", y = "Number of vehicles")

ggplotly(manufacturer_plot)

```

Vehicles count by fuel type Plot

```{r}

fuel_count_plot <- used_cars_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = fuel)) +
  geom_bar(alpha = 0.5) +
  coord_flip() +
  ggtitle("Vehicles count by fuel type") +
  labs(x = "Fuel type", y = "Number of vehicles") +
  theme_bw()

ggplotly(fuel_count_plot)

```


Price by state plot

```{r}

price_state_plot <- used_cars_data %>%

  coord_flip() +

```
